overview: In 1964, my country will conduct the first explosion test of the original LF bomb in the Lop Nur area in the west. After aerial reconnaissance, relevant personnel found a group of people and animals in the restricted area of the test site from the washed aerial film. There were only three days left before the detonation period. Experts from various areas of the nuclear base met to study and agreed that the detonation time could not be changed and that people should be sent into the Gobi to rescue people before the detonation.
title: 飞跃绝境
